sentences.en: Day in and day out, the flat crack of the tank guns reverberates through the little Bavarian town.
sentences.cn: 日复一日地，单调的坦克炮的轰隆声在巴伐利亚的这个小镇上空回响着。

sentences.en: Echoes of cries of pain reverberate in my ear.
sentences.cn: 痛苦的哀鸣在我心中一遍遍回响.

sentences.en: Echoes of cries of pain reverberate in my hear.
sentences.cn: 痛苦呼喊的回声回荡在我的内心.

sentences.en: Echoes of cries of pain reverberate in my heart.
sentences.cn: 痛哭的回音在我的胸膛震荡.

sentences.en: Echoes of cries of pain reverberate my heart.
sentences.cn: 痛苦喊叫的回声在我心中回荡.

sentences.en: If bosses treat employees and customers with fairness and respect, this, too, will reverberate.
sentences.cn: 如果老板对雇员与客户公平、尊重, 这同样会在雇员身上得到体现.

sentences.en: The controversy surrounding the take-over yesterday continued to reverberate around the television industry.
sentences.cn: 昨天围绕接管展开的争论在电视业仍然有巨大的反响。

sentences.en: The killing continue continued to rebelled rate reverberate also in Congress.
sentences.cn: 这起枪杀事件也不断的在国会引起反响.

sentences.en: The killing continued reverberate also in congress Congress.
sentences.cn: 这一枪击案在国会也引起了强烈反响.

sentences.en: The loud and clear sound in directs in the hall to reverberate.
sentences.cn: 洪亮的声音在指挥大厅里回响.

sentences.en: The news sent shock waves through the community that have continued to reverberate to this day.
sentences.cn: 这则消息震惊了整个社区，直到现在还波澜未息。

sentences.en: The waves reverberate as far away as the end of the building.
sentences.cn: 声波反射的很远,一直传到建筑物的那一头.

sentences.en: The white walls of the house coldly reverberate the lunar radiance.
sentences.cn: 粉白的墙在深蓝色天空的衬托下泛着亮光,冷冷地反射着月亮的清辉.

words.tran_cn: 回响的；反射的；起回声的

trans.tran_en: if a loud sound reverberates, it is heard many times as it is sent back from different surfaces
